short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts the meta data of the current web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: getMetaData is a useful tool that provides a clear display of all meta data and main SEO information to help improve your website's visibility on the internet. The tool covers various aspects, including the title and its length, description and its length, URL, meta-robots, headers in HTML (H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, and H6), and more. You can even use ETERNAL TOOLS to analyze your website and obtain suggestions for improvement in areas such as HTML, CSS, Google Rich Snippet, and PageSpeed.
